allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json lines = sys.stdin.readlines\(\) # Get last few messages to understand context for line in lines[-30:]: try: obj = json.loads\(line\) role = obj.get\(''role'', ''''\) content = obj.get\(''content'', ''''\) if isinstance\(content, list\): for c in content: if isinstance\(c, dict\) and c.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': text = c[''text''][:500] print\(f''[{role}]: {text}''\) print\(''---''\) elif isinstance\(content, str\): print\(f''[{role}]: {content[:500]}''\) print\(''---''\) except: pass ")
